price: 50. Ils craignent leur Seigneur Qui les transcende et font ce qui leur est ordonné.[273]
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩
footnotes: [273] Une prosternation est recommandée à la fin de ce verset.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
